lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (laughs)

lines.name: ALLURA
lines.text: "Well, I guess this is in order."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just a little pocket of darkness.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Aw, man.

lines.name: PIKE
lines.text: What's that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You hear some rustling.

lines.name: KEYLETH
lines.text: We've been in darkness so long.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The sphere of darkness finishes and you see she's holding a sack of coins, that you don't know where she picked them up from.

lines.name: KEYLETH
lines.text: Oh!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She steps back over to her chair, sits down, and says,

lines.name: ALLURA
lines.text: "So as we've discussed, 10,000 gold pieces, "to the lot of you, and my greatest thanks."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: "to the lot of you, and my greatest thanks." (all laugh)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's very heavy.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Good thing I'm strong then, huh?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With her 9 strength, it sags.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (all laugh)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She sits back down, says,

lines.name: ALLURA
lines.text: "You tell me what else if anything has transpired, "and I'll let you know what you've missed."

lines.name: PIKE
lines.text: Well.

lines.name: TIBERIUS
lines.text: We have Orcus's horn. So that's a thing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Allura, still sitting in her chair, hands in place and says

lines.name: ALLURA
lines.text: "I'm sorry, what did you say?"

lines.name: TIBERIUS
lines.text: That's what you wanted I'm assuming, to destroy it.

lines.name: VEX
lines.text: But we haven't touched it though.

lines.name: TIBERIUS
lines.text: No.

lines.name: ALLURA
lines.text: "All right."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Kima gives her a nod and says,

lines.name: KIMA
lines.text: "Now we're figuring out what to do with it."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Allura looks to the ground for a moment and says,

lines.name: ALLURA
lines.text: "I don't know much of this object you say, "but if it was the source of the creature's power, "and it carries with it the connotations of Orcus, "then this is a very, very ill omen indeed."

lines.name: TIBERIUS
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: ALLURA
lines.text: "This must be brought before the council immediately."

lines.name: TIBERIUS
lines.text: Wait.

lines.name: KEYLETH
lines.text: The council?

lines.name: TIBERIUS
lines.text: The council?

lines.name: ALLURA
lines.text: "The council of Tal'Dorei, the council you are part of."

lines.name: TIBERIUS
lines.text: That helps.

lines.name: PIKE
lines.text: Are you going there, right now, also?

lines.name: ALLURA
lines.text: "Yes, I was summoned to it."

lines.name: PIKE
lines.text: We were as well.

lines.name: TIBERIUS
lines.text: The fact that we even share this information with Kima and with you is a very dangerous thing to begin with.

lines.name: ALLURA
lines.text: "I agree."

lines.name: TIBERIUS
lines.text: Are the council trustworthy?

lines.name: ALLURA
lines.text: "And, rest assured, "I have my checks and balances in place as well."

lines.name: VAX
lines.text: What effect it might have on them, on us.

lines.name: ALLURA
lines.text: "Can you assess what the mistrust would be "to not bring this before the sovereign and the council?"

lines.name: TIBERIUS
lines.text: Namely, if the immediate want is for it to be immediately destroyed, because that's what needs to happen with anything from Orcus, as you very well know.

lines.name: ALLURA
lines.text: "But I also don't think you should sow mistrust with the council "by keeping any of this information from them."

lines.name: KEYLETH
lines.text: It's not about trust.

lines.name: VEX
lines.text: Uriel has been corrupted once already.

lines.name: KEYLETH
lines.text: Exactly.

lines.name: ALLURA
lines.text: "I think he would take in to you, "his ear bent in your direction quite strongly."

lines.name: KEYLETH
lines.text: Correct, but couldn't you also safely say that he is therefore fairly easy corruptible? If he had been corrupted before, even not if subconsciously, I'm not saying intentionally, but he clearly...

lines.name: ALLURA
lines.text: "You would know best "what was responsible for corrupting our sovereign, "as you did fight and one was felled, "by it's own strength."

lines.name: KEYLETH
lines.text: I'm saying Lady Allura, that there is essences, there seems to be magical properties to this horn that corrupt even some of the strongest willed individuals.

lines.name: ALLURA
lines.text: "And that itself is the safest course of action."

lines.name: TIBERIUS
lines.text: I agree.

lines.name: VAX
lines.text: And you trust the council. That's enough for me.

lines.name: PERCY
lines.text: That's enough for me as well.

lines.name: KEYLETH
lines.text: Pike? Where do you stand.

lines.name: TIBERIUS
lines.text: That's definitely enough for me.

lines.name: KEYLETH
lines.text: Pike? Where do you stand.

lines.name: TIBERIUS
lines.text: I might have a solution as well for actually destroying it, so I will follow your lead.

lines.name: PERCY
lines.text: I think the best course of action is to trust people.

lines.name: VAX
lines.text: And we're incapable of destroying the thing on our own.

lines.name: TIBERIUS
lines.text: I'm letting her take the lead on this, and when the situation presents itself I might have a solution to destroy it outright.

lines.name: VEX
lines.text: Why don't you share that with us now Tiberius, instead of keeping it secret?

lines.name: VAX
lines.text: Just give us a rough sketch, maybe? instead of keeping it secret?

lines.name: TIBERIUS
lines.text: Very well.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I'll pull out my bag of holding.

lines.name: TIBERIUS
lines.text: This.

lines.name: KEYLETH
lines.text: The mending wheel?

lines.name: TIBERIUS
lines.text: No, the bag.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: An empty fist?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He pulled out the bag.

lines.name: KEYLETH
lines.text: Okay. Would you care to elaborate, Tiberius?

lines.name: TIBERIUS
lines.text: If we are to have our memories erased, as you say, then it would guarantee that when we place the thing in a bag of holding and destroy that bag, it will then be dissipated into that void.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At which point, Allura raises her hand and says,

lines.name: ALLURA
lines.text: "Githyanki themselves and their great ships."

lines.name: TIBERIUS
lines.text: I hate yankees.

lines.name: ALLURA
lines.text: "Gith --nevermind."

lines.name: PIKE
lines.text: So it could be bad.

lines.name: TIBERIUS
lines.text: There are things --

lines.name: ALLURA
lines.text: "I'm not saying there isn't merit to this, but I think "it would be best we put it somewhere "where at least we know for certain no one will find it, "as opposed to just hoping it disappears somewhere."

lines.name: TIBERIUS
lines.text: But the memory thing is crucial.

lines.name: KEYLETH
lines.text: What about those who might be uncomfortable with toying around with my memories and tramping along around in my head, I don't really want --

lines.name: VAX
lines.text: Why don't you think about it for a while?

lines.name: GROG
lines.text: My head's pretty fragile as it is.

lines.name: VAX
lines.text: We're talking about erasing the path back to this thing, we're not talking about removing your adolescent years from your memory. Just this one thing.

lines.name: GROG
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: KEYLETH
lines.text: Wouldn't we have to erase all memories surrounding it? We wouldn't even remember our trip into the underdark?

lines.name: PERCY
lines.text: I think we could perhaps just erase the memory of where we put it.

lines.name: TIBERIUS
lines.text: That is what I assume will happen.

lines.name: ALLURA
lines.text: "Like I've said, these magics have not been tampered with "in nearly 200 years."

lines.name: KEYLETH
lines.text: So we're gonna break the seal on some untampered-with magics and just experiment.

lines.name: ALLURA
lines.text: "But for an item as dangerous as what you say, "perhaps this is one of those special occasions."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: She's working for the Illuminati and we're basically the A-team, so I think she might know a little better.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The A-team?

lines.name: KEYLETH
lines.text: What do you think, Pike?

lines.name: PIKE
lines.text: And I do trust Allura.

lines.name: TIBERIUS
lines.text: I'm all tapped out.

lines.name: PIKE
lines.text: That was a good one.

lines.name: VAX
lines.text: And if we don't like it we can step.

lines.name: PERCY
lines.text: We have time.

lines.name: ALLURA
lines.text: "We'll see which resources they have at their disposal."

lines.name: PERCY
lines.text: I'm sure they're waiting for us.

lines.name: ALLURA
lines.text: "Are you guys familiar with the Wilder Fens?"

lines.name: VAX
lines.text: Sorry? The Wilder Fens?

lines.name: ALLURA
lines.text: "Between Wilder Fens, "and there was the Cortigian League from Wildmount, "and they just tore through Emon with a caravan of "partying gypsies that destroyed everything in their path."

lines.name: KEYLETH
lines.text: Who?

lines.name: TIBERIUS
lines.text: Damn gypsies.

lines.name: ALLURA
lines.text: "The Cortian League."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The Cortian League.

lines.name: ALLURA
lines.text: "From Wildmount, the north."

lines.name: PERCY
lines.text: it was guns and swords and...

lines.name: ALLURA
lines.text: "We have some business there getting Syngorn situated."

lines.name: VEX
lines.text: Oh, Syldor!

lines.name: ALLURA
lines.text: "So, business has been... fair."

lines.name: PERCY
lines.text: Shall we take this to the council then?

lines.name: VAX
lines.text: We'll get to that later.

lines.name: ALLURA
lines.text: "All right. Let's go to the council then."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A female dragonborn paladin.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Say that one more time? Guardian who's a what now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Guardian Tofor Bratoras.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: To-for?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Bratoras. Her name's been mentioned before but this is the first time you guys have actually seen her in person.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It's a girl?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You haven't seen very many dragonborn at all within Emon, and as soon as she meets your gaze, she gives you a look of deep, deep stinkeye.

lines.name: TIBERIUS
lines.text: Yes. I'm sure you've heard of my father Kravanas, my mother Penelope? Tofor: "And perhaps you should close that trap and sit across the table as far from me as possible. "

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She seems to spit the words almost, and sits back in her chair.

lines.name: TIBERIUS
lines.text: Mind your tongue.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He is shaved bald with tattoos on one side of his face, and he introduces himself.

lines.name: MALE
lines.text: "I'm terribly, sorry. I did not mean "for there to be any sort of misunderstanding here."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He gives a slight nudge to Tofor.

lines.name: MALE
lines.text: "I am the master of secrets here within the council."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He extends his hand towards you, almost like alleviating the tension.

lines.name: TIBERIUS
lines.text: Seeker Asum: "I assume you're the ones we're waiting for, "please have a seat."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At which point he puts his hand on the sovereign's shoulder and says,

lines.name: MALE
lines.text: "I've heard nothing but great things."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Allura finds her side of the table and gestures the rest of you.

lines.name: ALLURA
lines.text: "Please, have a seat."

lines.name: TIBERIUS
lines.text: I stand. I don't sit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He hands him the papers and says,

lines.name: URIELTALDOREI
lines.text: "Get this to Lady and Lord Briarwood "as soon as possible, thank you."

lines.name: URIEL
lines.text: "But yes, how is Vox Machina."

lines.name: VAX
lines.text: We stumbled into a veritable hornets' nest of them below the city.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you say illithid, you do notice that Seeker Asum Emring, the halfling, immediately sits back in his chair with a look of 'oh, snap'.

lines.name: VAX
lines.text: Fleeing the city... destroying a god? I think.

lines.name: VEX
lines.text: I don't think we destroyed the god.

lines.name: TIBERIUS
lines.text: The beholder is merely a demi-demon.

lines.name: VEX
lines.text: Yes, it was something he had possessed, but the god still lives.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes, but Orcus was behind the beholder.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We just have the horn.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He didn't get himself back up.

lines.name: KEYLETH
lines.text: Because Orcus is a god of necromancy and undeath.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: That's what the horn does.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's got hidden in it something --

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: It absolutely has -- Remember, it laughed at me when I tried to crush it --

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: --is what I'm saying.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Allura looks at you strangely.

lines.name: ALLURA
lines.text: "Tiberius, you sound different."

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I was talking to --

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I know.

lines.name: VAX
lines.text: Be that as it may we riled up a city of --

lines.name: PERCY
lines.text: Mind flayers.

lines.name: VAX
lines.text: We ended up falling ass over tea kettle in the Lyceum, so here we are.

lines.name: URIEL
lines.text: "Well, welcome back."

lines.name: VAX
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: URIEL
lines.text: "It's glad to see you're safe."

lines.name: VAX
lines.text: We've brought a little bit of the evil with us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She's kept to the back at this point, and says,

lines.name: KIMA
lines.text: "But, listen to what they have to say "and understand they are as trustworthy as they come."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At which point the sovereign lifts a hand up to her and says,

lines.name: URIEL
lines.text: "So. What is this evil you bring with you?"

lines.name: VAX
lines.text: We have it stored safely away.

lines.name: KEYLETH
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: VAX
lines.text: And we brought it back with us.

lines.name: KEYLETH
lines.text: It is one of the two horns of Orcus.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Tofor says, Tofor: "You said Orcus?"

lines.name: PERCY
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: TIBERIUS
lines.text: Are you deaf?

lines.name: KEYLETH
lines.text: Tiberius.

lines.name: PERCY
lines.text: Manners.

lines.name: VAX
lines.text: "Sent as far away-- "If this is indeed an artifact of Orcus, "it cannot exist on this plane."

lines.name: PERCY
lines.text: Plans must be drawn up.

lines.name: KEYLETH
lines.text: That's kind of what we thought.

lines.name: TIBERIUS
lines.text: Yes we knew this already.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At which point Kima steps forward and says

lines.name: KIMA
lines.text: "Lest we can come up with some sort of "way to destroy this item."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Why not take it to the Lyceum."

lines.name: VAX
lines.text: I want to make an insight check on the whole table.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Dang.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I want to also double-check, who was it that handed off the letter to the Briarwoods?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That was the sovereign.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Sovereign? Thank you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So which individual, the Arbiter?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, Arbiter Braum. What'd you roll?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Just a ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ten?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Can I insight the seeker?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's your insight roll?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Thirteen.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thirteen? Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I would like to insight the sovereign just because, reasons.

lines.name: PIKE
lines.text: Yeah, we do.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: One.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Starting the game off strong guys.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think you need some Florida rolling.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm just an idiot thinking.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think you need some Florida rolling.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, I think so too. You're awfully quiet.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Because Matt can totally whisper to me if I get this good.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He'll text you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'll text it to you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Roll high.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hold on, I'm looking.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: She's rolling.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Seventeen.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Eleventeen?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Seventeen!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Seventeen!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A total of 17?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Eleventy-seven.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: On which individual?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Which person at the table, sis?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Your brother?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no! On the deep voiced guy!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: The Arbiter.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Arbiter Braum.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (all laugh)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Why you gotta be like that, huh?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So nothing too particular catches your shit radar.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: GROG
lines.text: We are not leaving the horn here.

lines.name: VEX
lines.text: No..

lines.name: PERCY
lines.text: We would have to leave you here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "And the crystals that keep them elevated."

lines.name: TIBERIUS
lines.text: I love skyships.

lines.name: VEX
lines.text: "Like Kima was requesting."

lines.name: KEYLETH
lines.text: So you're saying essentially our two options are we can either keep it here and study it to try and figure out a way to destroy it and have all of the risks of this horn being inside the city or we take the other massive risks of trying to ship it off somewhere and hope that it gets sealed away?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Do you wish to have all the darkness of this land "slowly swarm in on the city?"

lines.name: VAX
lines.text: I think we're of a like mind.

lines.name: TIBERIUS
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: VAX
lines.text: I think we should take it from the city.

lines.name: KEYLETH
lines.text: I think it's a giant target on our backs right now.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I turn to the Arbiter.

lines.name: TIBERIUS
lines.text: I'm not sure if it was alerted by being placed on the beholder's head to begin with, but I heard something.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Looking at Tofor.

lines.name: TIBERIUS
lines.text: That we should get it out of here immediately.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At which point the sovereign who's been kinda quiet this moment, says,

lines.name: URIEL
lines.text: "If we are to take it elsewhere "I trust the opinion of you, of Kima, and Allura."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At which point Allura takes a moment and says,

lines.name: ALLURA
lines.text: "Ancient magics."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Allura shuts her down and says,

lines.name: ALLURA
lines.text: "So I think if there was a god whose guidance "we can look into, "I would put my trust in the clergy of Bahamut."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She looks to Kima. Kima nods her head.

lines.name: TIBERIUS
lines.text: Of course we'd agree with such sentiments as well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Kima raises her maul and says,

lines.name: KIMA
lines.text: "Then we shall seal this bastard."

lines.name: TIBERIUS
lines.text: Kima.

lines.name: GROG
lines.text: (all laugh)

lines.name: TIBERIUS
lines.text: The blessing of Sarenrae and other light sources, divine powers, could be helpful as well.

lines.name: KIMA
lines.text: "After all, there is nothing wrong with more positive energy "instilled to maintain such a negative force."

lines.name: KEYLETH
lines.text: I personally don't trust this horn travelling anywhere without at least one of our supervision.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At which point the sovereign speaks up and says,

lines.name: URIEL
lines.text: "Just keep that in mind."

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: (all laugh)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Taking quite advantage of his current state of mind.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: You have no idea what I'm going to do for the rest of this game.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Like you... to Scanlan?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: No, I was pointing at him.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Right in the ear.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Wet willy. To our little gnome bard.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: (laughs)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Uriel looks around.

lines.name: URIEL
lines.text: "How long will it take for this vessel to arrive?"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At which point, Kima scratches her chin for a second.

lines.name: KIMA
lines.text: "I can't imagine more than two weeks?"

lines.name: KEYLETH
lines.text: Two weeks?!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At which point --

lines.name: TIBERIUS
lines.text: That's 14 days, your highness.

lines.name: KEYLETH
lines.text: (sighs)

lines.name: VEX
lines.text: That was adorable.

lines.name: PIKE
lines.text: A fortnight?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At which point Allura stands forward and says,

lines.name: ALLURA
lines.text: "It's in the means of --"

lines.name: KEYLETH
lines.text: You don't have like a ship dock?

lines.name: TIBERIUS
lines.text: I'm sure if they did they would probably use that one.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (all laugh)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At this point Allura sits forward and to the rest of the group, says,

lines.name: ALLURA
lines.text: "Perhaps we can facilitate a two-day travel?"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At which point the group leans back for a second and Kima goes,

lines.name: KIMA
lines.text: "Well fine. Yeah, I guess."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Shoots a dirty look a little bit to --

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I do an insight check on Allura really quick?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: She's saying a ship will be ready in two days or take two days to travel?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Allura's saying,

lines.name: ALLURA
lines.text: "If we can pool our resources, "there's no reason why we can't "bring them here nearly instantaneously."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Thirteen.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The rest of the group looks around and Arcanist in the silence goes,

lines.name: ALLURA
lines.text: "Do we agree to that?"

lines.name: TIBERIUS
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: PERCY
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: VAX
lines.text: I think we would feel comfortable going along for the ride and seeing this thing through to the end.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The sovereign nods.

lines.name: URIEL
lines.text: "Although this is much more important business, I do agree."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Then he gives a laugh and smile to raise a bit of levity in the room that nobody seems to respond to.

lines.name: URIEL
lines.text: "But nevertheless "if you wish to travel and see this through "I don't see there would be any complaint."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He looks to Lady Kima and Kima says,

lines.name: KIMA
lines.text: "I'm bad at this political stuff."

lines.name: MATT
